original_text: Pilate knew why the leaders of the priests had brought Jesus to him. They were jealous because people liked Jesus so much.
korean_text: 이는 그가 대제사장들이 시기로 예수를 넘겨 준 줄 앎이러라

sentences.original_text: why the leaders of the priests had brought Jesus to him
sentences.korean_translation: 대제사장들의 지도자들이 예수님을 그에게 데려온 이유를

sentences.original_text: because people liked Jesus so much
